initial_area: you are in conflict with yourself because of decisions you have to make
to make piece with yourself you must face these conflicts. To do that you must collect 4 Conflict Stones
Love Stone, Family Stone, Spirit Stone, Friendship Stone
The purple left path leads you to Love Conflict Area
The up blue path lead you to the Family Conflict Area
The right green path lead you to the Spirit Conflict Area
The down orange path lead you to the Friendship Conflict Area
Face your conflicts and get the 4 stones and come back here to make piece with yourself
use WASD to move and 'F' to attack, that bar on the right upper corner is you HP
